name: Vairy and the magic of Fairies
name_original: Vairy and the magic of Fairies
description:
Vairy and the magic of Fairies is an adventure game developed by POISONJESUS02, Justpeli and Pollogamerz. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play Vairy and the magic of Fairies on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
